00006 GaussianProcess::GaussianProcess(int Inputs, int Outputs, mat& Xdata, vec& ydata, CovarianceFunction& cf) : Locations(Xdata), Observations(ydata), covFunc(cf), ForwardModel(Inputs, Outputs)

00020 
00021 void GaussianProcess::makePredictions(vec& Mean, vec& Variance, const mat& Xpred, CovarianceFunction &cf) const
00022 {
00023         assert(Mean.size() == Variance.size());
00024         assert(Xpred.rows() == Mean.size());
00025 
00026         mat Sigma(Observations.size(), Observations.size());
00027         mat Cpred(Locations.rows(), Xpred.rows());
00028 
00029         cf.covariance(Cpred, Locations, Xpred);                   // k = k(X,x*)
00030         covFunc.covariance(Sigma, Locations);                     // K = K(X,X)
00031 
00032         vec alpha = ls_solve(Sigma, Observations);                       // a = K^{-1} * y
00033         Mean = Cpred.transpose() * alpha;                                // mu* = k' * K^{-1} * y
00034 
00035         vec variancePred(Xpred.rows());
00036         cf.computeDiagonal(variancePred, Xpred);                    // k* = K(x*,x*)
00037         mat v = ls_solve(computeCholesky(Sigma).transpose(), Cpred);     // v = K^{-1} * k
00038         Variance = variancePred - sum(elem_mult(v, v));                  // diag( k* - k'*K^{-1}*k )
00039 }
00040 
00041 void GaussianProcess::makePredictions(vec& Mean, vec& Variance, const mat& Xpred, const mat& C) const
00042 {
00043 
00044         assert(Mean.size() == Variance.size());
00045         assert(Xpred.rows() == Mean.size());
00046 
00047         mat Sigma, cholSigma;
00048         cholSigma.set_size(Observations.size(), Observations.size());
00049         
00050         Sigma.set_size(Observations.size(), Observations.size());
00051 //      cholSigma.set_size(Observations.rows(), Observations.rows());
00052         
00053         covFunc.covariance(Sigma, Locations);
00054 
00055         mat Cpred;
00056         Cpred.set_size(Locations.rows(), Xpred.rows(), false);
00057 
00058         covFunc.covariance(Cpred, Locations, Xpred);
00059 
00060         //mat alpha = C * Observations;
00061 
00062         covFunc.covariance(Sigma, Locations);
00063         
00064         cholSigma = computeCholesky(Sigma);
00065 
00066         vec alpha = ls_solve_chol(cholSigma, Observations);
00067 
00068         Mean = Cpred.transpose() * alpha;
00069 
00070         vec sigsq;
00071 
00072         sigsq.set_size(Xpred.rows(), false);
00073         
00074         covFunc.computeDiagonal(sigsq, Xpred);  
00075 
00076         Variance = sum(elem_mult((Cpred.transpose() * C), Cpred.transpose()), 2);       
00077         Variance = sigsq + Variance;    
00078         
00079 }

00081 double GaussianProcess::loglikelihood() const
00082 {
00083 
00084         mat Sigma(Observations.size(), Observations.size());
00085         mat cholSigma(Observations.size(), Observations.size());
00086 
00087         covFunc.covariance(Sigma, Locations);
00088 
00089         cholSigma = computeCholesky(Sigma);
00090 
00091         mat invSigma = computeInverseFromCholesky(Sigma);
00092         vec alpha = invSigma * Observations;
00093 
00094 //      vec alpha = ls_solve(Sigma, Observations);
00095         
00096         double out1 = 0.5 * dot(Observations,alpha);
00097 
00098         double out2 = sum(log(diag(cholSigma)));
00099                 
00100         return out1 + out2 + 0.5*Observations.size()*log(2*pi);
00101         
00102 }

00130 double GaussianProcess::objective() const
00131 {

00136 vec GaussianProcess::gradient() const
00137 {
00138         vec grads(covFunc.getNumberParameters());
00139 
00140         
00141         mat Sigma(Observations.size(), Observations.size());
00142         mat cholSigma(Observations.size(), Observations.size());
00143 
00144         covFunc.covariance(Sigma, Locations);
00145         cholSigma = computeCholesky(Sigma);
00146         mat invSigma = computeInverseFromCholesky(Sigma);
00147         vec alpha = invSigma * Observations;
00148 
00149 
00150 //      vec alpha = ls_solve(Sigma, Observations);
00151         mat W = (invSigma - outer_product(alpha, alpha, false));
00152 
00153         mat partialDeriv(Observations.size(), Observations.size());
00154 
00155         for(int i = 0; i < covFunc.getNumberParameters(); i++)
00156         {
00157                 covFunc.covarianceGradient(partialDeriv, i, Locations);
00158                 //grads(i) = sum(sum(elem_mult(W, partialDeriv))) / 2;
00159                 grads(i) = elem_mult_sum(W, partialDeriv) / 2;
00160 // official - but slower                grads(i) = sum(diag(W * partialDeriv)) / 2;
00161         }
00162         return grads; 
00163 }

00170 {

00174 mat GaussianProcess::computeCholesky(const mat& iM) const 
00175 {
00176         mat M = iM;// oops, was i inadvertantly writing to this?
00177         assert(M.rows() == M.cols());
00178         
00179         const double ampl = 1.0e-10;
00180         const int maxAttempts = 10;
00181         
00182         mat cholFactor(M.rows(), M.cols());
00183 
00184         int l = 0;
00185         bool success = chol(M, cholFactor);
00186         if(success)
00187         {
00188                 return cholFactor;
00189         }
00190         else
00191         {
00192                 double noiseFactor = abs(ampl * (trace(M) / double(M.rows())));
00193                 while(!success)
00194                 {
00195                         M = M + (noiseFactor * eye(M.rows()));
00196 
00197                         if(l > maxAttempts)
00198                         {
00199                                 cerr << "Unable to compute cholesky decomposition" << endl;
00200                                 break;
00201                         }
00202                         l++;
00203                         noiseFactor = noiseFactor * 10;
00204                         success = chol(M, cholFactor);
00205                 }
00206                 cout << "Matrix not positive definite.  After " << l << " attempts, " << noiseFactor << " added to the diagonal" << endl;
00207         }
00208         return cholFactor;
00209 }
00210 
00211 mat GaussianProcess::computeInverseFromCholesky(const mat& C) const
00212 {
00213         mat cholFactor = computeCholesky(C);
00214         mat invChol = backslash(cholFactor, eye(cholFactor.rows()));
00215         return invChol * invChol.transpose();
00216 }
